com.groep6.pfor.services

Class GameService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.groep6.pfor.services.GameService

  • public class GameService
extends java.lang.Object
    The GameService class acts as a gateway to Firebase for all Game related actions
    Author:
    Owen Elderbroek

      • getGame

        public Game getGame(java.lang.String code)
             throws NoDocumentException
        Obtain a game using its lobby code
        Parameters:
        code - The lobby code of the requested game
        Returns:
        The game that has that code
        Throws:
        NoDocumentException - If the query had no results

      • getPlayers

        public java.util.List<Player> getPlayers(java.lang.String code)
                                  throws NoDocumentException
        Obtain the list of players in a game Note that this operation is just as expensive as requesting the whole game, cache the entire game if you can.
        Parameters:
        code - The code of the game
        Returns:
        The list of players in that game
        Throws:
        NoDocumentException

      • setGame

        public void setGame(Game game)
        Update a game's data on server to this new data Warning! This will overwrite the entire game, Only use if you have good reason to!
        Parameters:
        game - The new game data that will override the old data

      • remove

        public void remove(java.lang.String code)
        Thanos snap a game out of the database, never to be seen again
        Parameters:
        code - The game code of the game to be Thanos snapped

      • create

        public void create(Game game)
        Create a game on the server.
        Parameters:
        game - The game to be created

        public static void removeListener()
